name: Verify Create Chatbot API when the chatbot name is invalid (Negative Case) -- @1.1

steps.name: Given Firebase_User sends POST request to create a chatbot with an invalid chatbot name "None"
When Firebase_the user receives the response
Then Firebase_the status code should be 400 for bad request error
And Firebase_the response should contain an error message "Bad Request"
And Firebase_the message should contain "Invalid input:"

fullName: Create Chatbot API: Verify Create Chatbot API when the chatbot name is invalid (Negative Case)
